name: Pandora's Box
description:
According to the myth, 'Pandora: the first woman on Earth', was given a gift vessel (box) by Zeus and told to never open it. 

But curiosity led Pandora to open the "Box"

It contained greed, envy, hatred, pain, disease, hunger, poverty, war, death and many evils.

She closed the box but the last thing that emerged from inside was shining  very bright, it was 'Hope'

This 'Hope' helps humans to survive the wickedness of the other things Pandora released into the world.

11 Editions for this Doodle are available, 

10 representing the unknown evils and 1 representing HOPE.
